text:
ctrocardiogram
What is the outlook for Electrocardiogram ?,"You don't need to take any special steps before having an electrocardiogram (EKG). However, tell your doctor or his or her staff about the medicines you're taking. Some medicines can affect EKG results.",NHLBI,Electrocardiogram
What is the outlook for Electrocardiogram ?,"An electrocardiogram (EKG) is painless and harmless. A nurse or technician will attach soft, sticky patches called electrodes to the skin of your chest, arms, and legs
